channel.title: R on Chris Turner
channel.description: Recent content in R on Chris Turner

item.title: The best of both worlds (R and Python)
item.description: #Blog After developing an understanding of how to use R-studio in my Computational Biology course this semester, my peers and I had the opportunity of combining R with Python. Python is a well-known computing language, but can also be used effectively for data science purposes and computational biology. In this post, I will show how Python code can actually be used inside an R script after installing some packages.
